If the integral transformation \\(X(t)\\) is executed starting from \\(z_0\\) at t = 0 and evolves according to \\(z(t)\\), will the function \\(X(T)\\) be the same as having applied \\(X(t)\\) under the dynamics \\(z(t) = Ce^{At}z_0\\) for all \\(t\\) without additional influences?
Explanation: The transformation \\(X(t)\\) depends not only on \\(z(t)\\) but also on the interplay between the matrices \\(A\\) and \\(B\\).
